body.p: Match the receptor classification to its example receptor and sensation.

feedback.p: Correct. These are detecting some external stimulus.
Incorrect. This would refer to sensations detected by the surfaces of the body.
Incorrect. This would refer to sensations detected by the surfaces of the body.

hint.p: This way of categorizing receptors includes hints right in the names. In Latin, “propio” means one’s own, “viscus” means internal organs, and “exterus” means outer.

feedback.p: Incorrect. Interoreceptor would refer to internal organs such as the heart, bladder, structures of the GI tract, etc.
Correct. These are all detecting some stimulus related to function of internal organs.
